title: Kawa no Hikari
synopsis: A story of a rat family who have to leave their home because humans start a construction site. Now the rats are searching for a place to stay.
voices: ['Yamadera, Kouichi', 'Kaneda, Tomoko', 'Orikasa, Fumiko', 'Tanaka, Atsuko', 'Hirano, Aya', 'Ootsuka, Akio']
staff: [['Hirakawa, Tetsuo', ['Director']], ['Tanaka, Kazuya', ['Sound Director']], ['Yoshioka, Takao', ['Script']], ['Yusa, Mimori', ['Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Composition']]]
